text: Engoniophos is a genus of sea snails, marine gastropod mollusks in the family Nassariidae. ==Taxonomy == This genus was treated within family Buccinidae. It was moved to family Nassariidae in 2016.Galindo, L. A., Puillandre, N., Utge, J., Lozouet, P., & Bouchet, P. (2016). "The phylogeny and systematics of the Nassariidae revisited (Gastropoda, Buccinoidea)". Molecular Phylogenetics and Evolution 99: 337-353. ==Species== Species within the genus Engoniophos include: * † Engoniophos erectus (Guppy, 1873) * Engoniophos unicinctus (Say, 1826) ==References== ==External links== Category:Nassariidae
title: Engoniophos
